text:
Grandmaster Klef watches you with an inscrutable smile. "Well done," he says at last. "You are an implacable opponent. I concede a draw, and this is not something I do lightly. A reward for your valiant efforts, then."

He takes out a glittering blue gem and hands it to you. "An ICE JEWEL. I hope it will be of some use to you in the struggles that await you in the lower level."

variables: He gestures, flinging a cobweb of energy around you. You feel a strange sensation as you begin to sink to the floor.
